/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The buildings lining the street are predominantly orange and white, their vibrant colors contrasting with the clear blue sky above. The street itself is lined with power lines, adding a touch of urban realism to the scene. Cars parked along the side of the road hint at the bustling activity of city life. The image captures the essence of Beijing, a city where tradition and modernity coexist.
